result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jason James Heucke

defendant.name: Heucke, Jason James
defendant.address: 419 North Saint Bernard Drive, De Pere, WI 54115

records.addlTxt:
Deputy District Attorney Caleb Saunders appears on behalf of the State. Defendant Jason James Heucke in court, in custody at Brown County Jail.  Attorney Shelley Cupino in court via zoom for Jason James Heucke. 
Defendant/attorney waives right to Preliminary Hearing and files waiver form with Court.
Plea negotiations placed on the record.
Court accepts waiver and orders defendant bound over to assigned branch.
Information to be filed.
Defense argues bond. Court denies bond modification since Judge Walsh already denied a bond modification. 
Bond continued.
Arraignment scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 10:30 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jason James Heucke in court, in custody at Brown County Jail.  Attorney Shelley Cupino in court for Jason James Heucke, via zoom.  Prosecuting attorney J. Foss Davis in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Court finds good cause to exceed time limits. 
Present bond continued
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Status conference on October 10, 2022 at 10:00 am.

11:44 AM Defendant Jason James Heucke in court, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Jessica R. Gereau in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant motions for bond modification.  State objects to bond modification.  Court denies modification request. Court appoints attorney.  Present bond continued
Status conference scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Attorney called to schedule PH.  Defendant in BCJ, Public defender in Sheboygan to appear via Zoom.  Zoom #'s given.  Advised date, time and location.
Preliminary hearing on October 6, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Jason James Heucke in court, in custody at Brown County Jail, via zoom.  Prosecuting attorney Meranda Hillmann in court for the State of Wisconsin. Victim appears.
Defendant requests to modify bond.
Bond arguments heard.
Court denies bond modification.
Bond arguments reserved for next date. State on notice. 
Present bond continued.
Indigency hearing scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
